channel.title: Need help with lag
channel.description: Can someone give me tips on making my server less laggy?...like is there a program i can run or something?...DO NOT SAY GET RAM,MEMORY, OR ANYTHING LIKE THAT IF YOU DO I WILL REPORT FOR SPAM

item.title: Need help with lag
item.dc:creator: @ryan123 ryan123
item.description:
@ryan123 wrote:

hey umm…im trying to get rid of these useless npc’s that just walk around and i went in npc handler and deleted the thing because one’s id was 336 and i deleted that whole thing in npc handler only but he didnt leave…what do i do?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with lag
item.dc:creator: @justlikers justlikers
item.description:
@justlikers wrote:

well, first off some servers have useless commands that make your compiler or server have to read more for it to run making it go more slowly. and for 2 dont post it on server status there are noobs who mass and fuck it up.
well back to the point if there are worthless npc’s or npc talk floodin just delete them.

Read full topic
